title: How one can be eligible to become a certified hacker being in 11th grade? - Quora

response.answer_text: I am not sure if there are age restrictions on getting certificates from EC-Council (which owns the CEH trademark) or any other reputed training provider. But you can surely be a “ethical hacker” even though not ‘certified’ with anyone, at any grade/age with right enthusiasm and curiosity to learn.
